results.title: Effects of different doses of atorvastatin, rosuvastatin, and simvastatin on elderly patients with ST-elevation acute myocardial infarction (AMI) after percutaneous coronary intervention (PCI).
results.text_hl: @SPECIES_9606 @@@Patients@@@ in high dose groups had significantly lower rates for surgical or percutaneous intervention, recurrence of @<m>DISEASE_Angina_Pectoris</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000787 @@@angina@@@, and rehospitalization.

citations.NLM: He W, Cao M, Li Z. Effects of different doses of atorvastatin, rosuvastatin, and simvastatin on elderly patients with ST-elevation acute myocardial infarction (AMI) after percutaneous coronary intervention (PCI). Drug Dev Res. 2020 Aug;81(5):551-556. PMID: 32142170

results.title: Effect of simvastatin on ischemic signs and symptoms in the Scandinavian simvastatin survival study (4S).
results.text_hl: In @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ participating in the Scandinavian @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@Simvastatin@@@ Survival Study, @CHEMICAL_Cholesterol @CHEMICAL_MESH:D002784 @@@cholesterol@@@ lowering with @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ reduced the incidence of @DISEASE_Carotid_Stenosis @DISEASE_MESH:D016893 @@@carotid bruits@@@ and cerebrovascular events as well as new-onset or worsening of @<m>DISEASE_Angina_Pectoris</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000787 @@@angina pectoris@@@ and @DISEASE_Intermittent_Claudication @DISEASE_MESH:D007383 @@@intermittent claudication@@@.

citations.NLM: Pedersen TR, Kjekshus J, Pyörälä K, Olsson AG, Cook TJ, Musliner TA, Tobert JA, Haghfelt T. Effect of simvastatin on ischemic signs and symptoms in the Scandinavian simvastatin survival study (4S). Am J Cardiol. 1998 Feb 1;81(3):333-5. PMID: 9468077
citations.BibTeX: @article{9468077, title={Effect of simvastatin on ischemic signs and symptoms in the Scandinavian simvastatin survival study (4S).}, author={Pedersen TR and Kjekshus J and Pyörälä K and Olsson AG and Cook TJ and Musliner TA and Tobert JA and Haghfelt T}, journal={Am J Cardiol}, volume={81}, number={3}, pages={333-5}}

results.title: Safety and tolerability of cholesterol lowering with simvastatin during 5 years in the Scandinavian Simvastatin Survival Study.
results.text_hl: The 4444 @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ aged 35 to 70 years (mean, 58.9 years) with @<m>DISEASE_Angina_Pectoris</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000787 @@@angina pectoris@@@ or previous @DISEASE_Myocardial_Infarction @DISEASE_MESH:D009203 @@@myocardial infarction@@@ and serum @CHEMICAL_Cholesterol @CHEMICAL_MESH:D002784 @@@cholesterol@@@ levels of 5.5 to 8.0 mmol/L (213-310 mg/dL) receiving a @CHEMICAL_Lipids @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008055 @@@lipid@@@-lowering diet were randomly assigned to take double-blind treatment with @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@, 20 to 40 mg once daily, or placebo.

citations.NLM: Pedersen TR, Berg K, Cook TJ, Faergeman O, Haghfelt T, Kjekshus J, Miettinen T, Musliner TA, Olsson AG, Pyörälä K, Thorgeirsson G, Tobert JA, Wedel H, Wilhelmsen L. Safety and tolerability of cholesterol lowering with simvastatin during 5 years in the Scandinavian Simvastatin Survival Study. Arch Intern Med. 1996 Oct 14;156(18):2085-92. PMID: 8862101
citations.BibTeX: @article{8862101, title={Safety and tolerability of cholesterol lowering with simvastatin during 5 years in the Scandinavian Simvastatin Survival Study.}, author={Pedersen TR and Berg K and Cook TJ and Faergeman O and Haghfelt T and Kjekshus J and Miettinen T and Musliner TA and Olsson AG and Pyörälä K and Thorgeirsson G and Tobert JA and Wedel H and Wilhelmsen L}, journal={Arch Intern Med}, volume={156}, number={18}, pages={2085-92}}

results.title: Effect of simvastatin on plasma interleukin-6 in patients with unstable angina.
results.text_hl: The @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ group also had better @<m>DISEASE_Angina_Pectoris</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000787 @@@angina@@@ control than the placebo group (post-treatment @<m>DISEASE_Angina_Pectoris</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000787 @@@angina@@@ score, 0.72+/-0.59 vs 1.07+/-0.76, P < 0.05).

citations.NLM: Ren HZ, Ma LL, Wang LX. Effect of simvastatin on plasma interleukin-6 in patients with unstable angina. Clin Invest Med. 2009 Aug 1;32(4):E280-4. PMID: 19640331
citations.BibTeX: @article{19640331, title={Effect of simvastatin on plasma interleukin-6 in patients with unstable angina.}, author={Ren HZ and Ma LL and Wang LX}, journal={Clin Invest Med}, volume={32}, number={4}, pages={E280-4}}

results.title: Cost effectiveness of simvastatin treatment to lower cholesterol levels in patients with coronary heart disease. Scandinavian Simvastatin Survival Study Group.
results.text_hl: BACKGROUND: The Scandinavian @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@Simvastatin@@@ Survival Study (4S) showed that lowering @CHEMICAL_Cholesterol @CHEMICAL_MESH:D002784 @@@cholesterol@@@ levels with @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ reduces mortality and morbidity in @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ with @<m>DISEASE_Angina_Pectoris</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000787 @@@angina pectoris@@@ or previous @DISEASE_Myocardial_Infarction @DISEASE_MESH:D009203 @@@acute myocardial infarction@@@.

citations.NLM: Johannesson M, Jönsson B, Kjekshus J, Olsson AG, Pedersen TR, Wedel H. Cost effectiveness of simvastatin treatment to lower cholesterol levels in patients with coronary heart disease. Scandinavian Simvastatin Survival Study Group. N Engl J Med. 1997 Jan 30;336(5):332-6. PMID: 9011785

results.title: Cost-effectiveness of cholesterol lowering. Results from the Scandinavian Simvastatin Survival Study (4S)
results.text_hl: The cost per life-year saved of @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ in the treatment of @DISEASE_Myocardial_Infarction @DISEASE_MESH:D009203 @@@post-myocardial infarction@@@ and @<m>DISEASE_Angina_Pectoris</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000787 @@@angina@@@ @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@, as determined from 4S data, is well within the range normally considered cost-effective.

citations.NLM: Jönsson B, Johannesson M, Kjekshus J, Olsson AG, Pedersen TR, Wedel H. Cost-effectiveness of cholesterol lowering. Results from the Scandinavian Simvastatin Survival Study (4S) Eur Heart J. 1996 Jul;17(7):1001-7. PMID: 8809516

results.title: [Antiischemic efficacy of trimetazidine in patients with intermittent claudication and effort angina].
results.text_hl: @SPECIES_9606 @@@Patients@@@ of group 1 (n=21) were given @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ (10-20 mg/day), @CHEMICAL_Clopidogrel @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000077144 @@@clopidogrel@@@ (75 mg/day) and @CHEMICAL_Trimetazidine @CHEMICAL_MESH:D014292 @@@trimetazidine@@@ (60 mg/day) for 6 months, those of group 2 - @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ and @CHEMICAL_Clopidogrel @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000077144 @@@clopidogrel@@@ also for 6 months.

citations.NLM: Syrkin AL, Artiukhina EG, Kanorskiĭ SG, Chuntyzheva MM. [Antiischemic efficacy of trimetazidine in patients with intermittent claudication and effort angina]. Kardiologiia. 2003;43(7):49-52. PMID: 12891299
